MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L22 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in South Road and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:40PM Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:57pm on the 25th December 2020.
